page.title: 04Beal House Farm.
page.content: {Mr. Alderson's Farm To the East of Mr. Bell's farm was Beal house Farm. This farmhouse is different to most of the farmhouses in our area because it is a high building built on a hill. We have read that the word "Beal" comes from "Baal" and that maybe along time ago, people worshipped the god Baal on the hill where the farmhouse is . To_day the farmer has about 200 acres,130 acres is used for crops ,60 acres is used for grass and there are about 7 acres of woodland. Most of the woodland is sycamore trees and the farmer cuts trees down to make a right of way. This farmer is planting half a mile of new hedging. A few years ago he pulled the hedge out and put fencing in but now he is putting it back.
